name: Lair of Shearer
description:
Lair of Shearer

Save your sheep by shearing them to release them from the lair!

Demo of a cute game idea generated inRNDGAME JAM II. This was my first attempt at working with Godot and I gotta say it was pretty intuitive to use! I'm a fullstack web dev by day and it is nice using the more declarative style of programming like in React.

The game is really rough, but I'm glad what I got done over the past two weekends working on this! The great splash screen logos and character design were done by my girlfriend (I am incapable of making anything a tenth as good). If I have more time I'm going to 1) flesh it out a bit more 2) clean up the... more interesting "design patterns" I used while writing the gd files.

Controls
  • Move: w a s d
  • Attack: j
Credits

  • Shubibubi for their Cozy environment packs
  • Trevor Lentz for the songs Taking Poison, Valor of Heroes, Town Center, and Do Not Run

Thanks for playing!
